user_request: A Mother's Day poem about how a mother's love is unconditional.
final_poem:
In hearts where tender whispers dwell,  
A lullaby sung at dawn's first light;  
Unconditional love that makes us whole—the mother’s call to tell:   
The anchor in our tempest-tossed night.    
Her embrace is warmth beyond compare, 
No force of the world can ever mar her grace or care.
